Package dao

Class AppointmentDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
dao.AppointmentDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAOImpl extends Object implements AppointmentDAO
The implementation class for the AppointmentDAO interface. This class uses SQL to interact with the MySQL database.
Author:
Aidan Strawder
